KarateInstructorThwartsKidnapping.name: Karate Instructor Thwarts Kidnapping
KarateInstructorThwartsKidnapping.summary: Would-be kidnapper chases woman into North Carolina karate dojo, where he's quickly subdued by an instructor.

MeetTheGrandfatherTeachingMartialArtsInA.name: Meet the grandfather teaching martial arts in a bid to tackle crime
MeetTheGrandfatherTeachingMartialArtsInA.summary: A 75-year-old grandfather has been teaching karate for nearly five decades in a bid to tackle crime and keep our streets safe. Martin Dobson, a chartered surveyor from Bromley, has apprehended two criminals with his martial arts skills and once kicked a robber into submission. Mr Dobson says the sport he loves allows him to keep fit. The chartered surveyor attended his first karate session in 1975, aged 27, and ever since then has been “hooked” on the sport which allows him to act with “precision, effectiveness, and control”.

Woman,22,UsesKarateTrainingToTakeDownMan.name: Woman, 22, Uses Karate Training To Take Down Man Who Broke Into Her Home
Woman,22,UsesKarateTrainingToTakeDownMan.summary: A woman's 10 years of karate lessons are being credited with helping her subdue a man suspected of breaking into her home on New Year's Day.
